# Today's Lion's Mane Jellyfish Sighting Forecast
```{r lionsmane, echo=FALSE}
img = update_forecast(version = "v0", v = "v0.015", model = "rf")
grid.raster(img)
```

# Lion's Mane Jellyfish Sighting Forecast Animation
```{r lm animation, echo=FALSE}
gif = make_movie(version = "v0", v = "v0.015", start_date = as.Date("2025-07-01"), end_date = as.Date("2025-07-08"), model = "rf")
```
